title: Recolored Rebels - Europa Universalis IV mod
description:
Recolored Rebels - Europa Universalis IV mod

Extract 7zip file to your C:Users[user]Documents Paradox Interactive Europa Universalis IV mod folder

Useful at-a-glance view to differentiate religious rebels from the common or garden varieties. Especially useful for Byzantine openers and similar. 

Muslim flags follow CK2 RGB values; darkest to lightest hue, Sunni, Shia, Ibadi. 
Orthdox types follow 'expensive' Tyrian purple (not red) RGB value 112 41 100 

Also includes new NAT.TGA for uncolonised province rebel flag. 

Ironman compatible.
